fullText:
Warforged Faith

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Warforged, any divine class
Benefit: When you use your warforged resolve racial power, one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier and can make a saving throw against an effect that deals ongoing damage and that a save can end.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 137.
